name: fruit-map-backend
description: Backend API for Fruit Map - Open Source Fruit Tree Mapping Platform

scripts.db:migrate: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/database.ts --migrations-path src/migrations --models-path src/models --require ts-node/register
scripts.db:migrate:undo: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config src/config/database.ts --migrations-path src/migrations --models-path src/models --require ts-node/register
scripts.db:seed: npx sequelize-cli db:seed --config src/config/database.ts --seeders-path src/seeders --models-path src/models --require ts-node/register
scripts.db:seed:undo: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --config src/config/database.ts --seeders-path src/seeders --models-path src/models --require ts-node/register

author: Fruit Map Community
